snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 88: Kryptonite:  Flamez Hedgehog  (Nitro/Manic Team)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Kryptonite: Flamez Hedgehog
Credit: Sonic Nitro Team / Manic Team (Manic Lightspeed)
Release Date: February 07, 2003

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: https://web.archive.org/web/20040911041839/http://fanmade.emulationzone.org/manicteam/software/Kryptonite.zip

00:00 - Menu
01:44 - Intro
03:26 - Zone 1
05:12 - Boss 1
07:11 - Zone 2
08:50 - Zone 3
12:21 - Boss 2
14:10 - Zone 4
15:49 - Boss 3
16:36 - Zone 5
18:01 - Zone 6
20:26 - Zone 7
22:12 - Final Boss A
23:42 - Final Boss B
24:09 - Ending
26:06 - Credits

NOTE: Sequel to this game is called "K2: Kryptonite Episode 2"
We take a look at Flamez the Hedgehog as he ventures off to slay the Demon.
Clearing taking some influence off of Dragon Ball.
The original Sonic characters don't make an appearance here what so ever.
Music is nice for the most part, physics a little bit rough, plenty of Story.
But the level design is a little bit on the lazy side as some are just a flat out copy paste
of each other.
